description:
News of an "Arrow" spinoff focused on The Flash has snowballed in the past few days. On Tuesday (July 30), the producers of "Arrow" talked to reporters about the details of the Barry Allen character and his "Flash" alter-ego.

Viewers will meet the Allen character over the course of three "Arrow" Season 2 episodes. At first, Barry Allen is nothing more than an ordinary forensic scientist, working at the Central City Police Department. In episodes 8 and 9, Oliver Queen will interact with Allen when the latter visits Starling City. The character will return in episode 20 for a more in-depth look at the future Flash's world.

This final episode will most likely serve as a pilot for any potential spinoff.

Producers Andrew Kreisberg and Geoff Johns wouldn't give away too much of the proposed plot for The Flash, but they were happy to share details of Barry Allen's basic personality.

"Despite the fact that he's got superpowers, I think there's something really relatable about Barry," Kreisberg said. "He got his powers by accident. He isn't a god, he isn't an alien, he wasn't seeking this out. These powers came to him and his reactions to that feel very human and grounded."

How does Barry Allen actually transform into The Flash then? "That's part of the fun for the audience, for the ride, to see how we do our 'Arrow' take on The Flash legacy," explained Kreisberg. But there will definitely be superpowers somehow. "He does need powers to become The Flash," Geoff Johns said. This Flash won't even replace his comic-book costume with a hoodie -- the character's signature red costume will appear.

As for the interactions between Oliver Queen's Green Arrow and Barry Allen's Flash, the two are mostly very different. According to Andrew Kreisberg, "Oliver Queen is a very dark and tortured soul, and Barry is not. I think it'll be a fun byplay to see these two characters together, because they both have distinctly different world views, while both caring deeply about right and wrong."

Geoff Johns added, "He's a cop. He follows the law, he follows the rules ... The last thing in the world he would ever think about is being a vigilante."

CW正在试图在自己狭小的荧幕上召唤正义联盟！

目前电视网正在开发《绿箭侠 Arrow》的衍生剧《闪电侠 Flash》，主角当然是那个跑的飞快的超级英雄Barry Allen。第二季《绿箭侠 Arrow》中的一集将作为后门试播集主打该角色，然后再考虑开发衍生剧的可能。

「我们首先打算引入Dr. Barry Allen这个循环角色以及他的故事，也就是大家熟知的闪电侠。」CW总裁Mark Pedowitz在周二的TCA见面会上告诉记者，「我们已经计划好了这一故事线，接下来要看看表现是否良好。我们的确希望能扩展整个DC宇宙。我们能够利用的角色非常丰富，这只是我们有预谋有组织的其中一步。」

《绿箭侠 Arrow》的执行制片人Greg Berlanti和Andrew Kreisberg将同DC娱乐的Geoff Johns携手监制该剧。掌镜《绿箭侠 Arrow》导航集的David Nutter同样也会执导这一后门试播集。

需要注意的是，尽管目前《绿箭侠 Arrow》始终保持贴近现实的基调，闪电侠的到来可能会造成一些改变。Kreisberg告诉记者，「我们初次见到Barry时，他只不过是个在Central City警署工作的法务专家。就像我们在《绿箭侠 Arrow》所做的一样，我们会努力保证故事尽可能地接近现实。这就是我们引入Barry的方式，直到观众发现他的生活似乎开始加速了。」

「我们希望剧中的角色会对这些剧变作出尽可能贴近真实的反应。超能力并不会成为剧中的常态。这些离奇事件发生后，剧中的人物会有自己的应对。」

「尽管Barry有超能力，但和正义联盟七巨头其他成员的共性是，他是偶然获得这一能力的。他并不是一个神，他不会主动去寻求。是超能力找到了他。他的反应仍然是非常人性的，真实的。」

同Oliver Queen相比，Barry的灵魂没有那么黑暗。「看到这两个角色在一起将非常有趣，因为两人的世界观截然不同，却又都有着分明的是非观。」Kreisberg补充道。

Barry将在绿箭侠第二季的第八和第九集率先亮相，而那个可能的后门试播集将被定在第20集。头两集将把Barry引入斯塔灵市，而关键的试播集则将正式引入闪电侠的世界。

《绿箭侠 Arrow》将于十月九日周三晚美东时间晚8点回归CW。你认为扮演闪电侠的可能人选会是谁呢？

description:
Ever since "Friends" wrapped up its monumentally successful run in 2004, fans of the NBC hit comedy have been holding out hope for a reunion movie of sorts. While persisting reunion rumors continually find themselves shot down, it doesn't stop them from reappearing. And now two of the show's ensemble are only further taunting those fans holding out hope by admitting they wish the show hadn't ended.自从《老友记》04年的完美收官之后，这部NBC喜剧的粉丝们一直都在盼望这部美剧能出电影版，让六个老友重聚。因此这些年来每过一段都会有《老友记》要拍电影版的流言，然后再消散，过一段时间这种流言再起。现在这部美剧的两位主要演员表示，他们也不希望这部剧就这样结束。这让粉丝们又燃起了希望。

Matthew Perry and Lisa Kudrow appeared together on CNN's "Piers Morgan Tonight" on Friday (July 26) while Perry was guest-hosting for Morgan, and the two said they wished they could go back to 2004 and fight for more seasons with Jennifer Aniston, Courtney Cox, Matt LeBlanc and David Schwimmer.Matthew Perry和LisaKudrow在上周五晚参加了CNN电视台的节目《皮尔斯·摩根今夜秀》，Perry替班Morgan，在节目上两位演员表示他们希望能够回到2004年，能和Jennifer Aniston、Courtney Cox和Matt LeBlanc以及Davis Schwimmer一起为《老友记》的更多季争取。

"I find myself sort of reminiscing about how much fun the show was, and the hours that we worked. You know, you can see how much we laughed and everything," Perry reveale. “我发现自己会去回想这部剧有多好玩，会怀念和大家一起工作的日子。大家也能看到当时我们每天会笑多少次，还有当时的一切一切，”Perry说。

Kudrow didn't disagree. "If it were up to us, like individually, oh, I would keep going," the "Web Therapy" actress said. Kudrow也非常同意。“如果这部剧没有结束，我肯定会愿意继续演，”这位现在正在网络剧《网疗记》出演的女星说。

The cast had decided as a whole not to continue, Perry said. But looking back at it, he wished they'd come to a different decision. "Friends" was "the greatest job in the world," he reminisced.当时全体演员都决定不再继续这部美剧，Perry说。但是现在想起来，他希望他们当时会有不同的决定。当《老友记》的演员是世界上最好的工作，他说。
